NO_ALTING: <:_:979009081325019156> You are only allowed to use **1** singular account to play and engage with Sofi
NO_HELPING_ALTERS: <:_:979009081325019156> Do not support or interact with alters and scammers. If you have suspicions about a user, please report them to staff
NO_EXPLOITING_BUGS: <:_:979009081325019156> Any and all bugs/exploits you find are to be reported immediately! Failure to comply with this rule will be punished
NO_FARMING: <:_:979009081325019156> You must not use your social media standing to gain any resources or cards on Sofi
NO_SELFBOT: <:_:979009081325019156> The use of macros and bots to gain an advantage is strictly prohibited
